Articles.Content:
One guy . . . vs this?

![Halo-Reach-Covenant-Files-4-10-SANGHEILI-ELITE-ULTRA-+-ENERGY-SWORD.jpg](http://www.electricblueskies.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/Halo-Reach-Covenant-Files-4-10-SANGHEILI-ELITE-ULTRA-+-ENERGY-SWORD.jpg)

Sierra don't think so.
Please enlighten me as to how this defeats a giant railgun wielding mech.

This does

![titan.jpg](http://gaarawarrgabs.files.wordpress.com/2011/09/titan.jpg)

BIGGER (WAAAYYYY BIGGER!) and moar powerful!

![Space_Hulk_by_Zen_Master.jpg](http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120914182759/warhammer40k/images/6/6f/Space_Hulk_by_Zen_Master.jpg)

A Judgement of Carrion (a Space Hulk) from warhammer 40k infested with tyranids ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Many times they are so huge that they have their own atmosphere and gravity.

**Edited <time datetime="2013-09-27T06:17:53Z" title="09/27/2013 06:17  AM" data-short="10 yr">September 27, 2013</time> by M.Wolfy**

> 
> Please enlighten me as to how this defeats a giant railgun wielding mech.

Standing that close to a cannon going off would mean no ear drums left.

![33793447.jpg](http://cdn.memegenerator.net/instances/400x/33793447.jpg)

That certainly does not stop it.

It would for the little girl standing next to it, anyway on with the show.

![Sajuuk_Main_Cannon.jpg](http://images.wikia.com/homeworld/images/6/66/Sajuuk_Main_Cannon.jpg)

![death-star-1.jpg](http://static.ddmcdn.com/gif/death-star-1.jpg)

by the way, captain sierra, here is a better pic for a size comparison to a normal human 

![24764_md-Apocalypse,%20Titan,%20Warhammer%2040,000,%20Warlord.jpg](http://images.dakkadakka.com/gallery/2009/3/27/24764_md-Apocalypse,%20Titan,%20Warhammer%2040,000,%20Warlord.jpg)

It could easily crush that mech with its foot ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif).

How about a real laser-armed space robot?

![curiosity-rover.jpg](http://www.blogcdn.com/www.engadget.com/media/2012/08/curiosity-rover.jpg)

In response to the stairlift:

![pcrf023527.jpg](http://images.inmagine.com/400nwm/aspireimages/pcrf023/pcrf023527.jpg)

Oops.

![SANY6478.JPG](https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ciGDTxhLplU/Tt9G82g0pTI/AAAAAAAABZM/RtgebDJrNNo/s1600/SANY6478.JPG)

Ignore the fact tha it is a toy, no real ones existed.
